grade_calculator.title: Grade Calculator
grade_calculator.description: Add your course assessments and click '{{button}}' to view the results

grade_results.title: Outcome
grade_results.results: In order to reach your goal of {{desiredGrade}}%, you will need to achieve at least <3>{{recommendedGrade}}%</3> for each of your remaining assessments
grade_results.results_success: You are guaranteed to reach {{desiredGrade}}% because the minimum grade for remaining assessments is less than 0%
grade_results.results_error: There are no assessments left to calculate

delete_confirm_dialog.title: Delete this course?
delete_confirm_dialog.content_multiple: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} course?
delete_confirm_dialog.content_multiple_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} courses?
delete_confirm_dialog.content: Are you sure you want to delete {{course}}?
delete_confirm_dialog.content_default: Are you sure you want to delete this course?

name.label: Course name
name.max: Course name must not exceed {{count}} characters

reset_confirm_dialog.title: Reset application data?
reset_confirm_dialog.content: Resetting the application data will clear out all settings including all saved course data. Are you sure you want to continue?

courses.label: Courses
courses.min: A minimum of {{count}} course is required
courses.min_plural: A minimum of {{count}} courses is required
courses.none: No courses available, please refer to the official Handbook

assessments.label: Assessments
assessments.max: Number of assessments must not exceed {{count}}

grade.label: Grade
grade.min: Grade must be greater or equal to zero

max_grade.label: Total grade
max_grade.min: Total grade must be greater than zero
max_grade.min_grade: Total grade must be greater or equal to grade
max_grade.required_grade: Total grade is required for the specified grade

desired_grade.label: Desired course grade
desired_grade.limit: Desired course grade must be between 0-100

grade_form.no_assessment: There is currently no assessment. Click '{{button}}' to create a new assessment
